name: I Really Hate Cubes
description:
I Really Hate Cubes is a small set of colourful, virtual reality shooting minigames for the HTC Vive in which you can show off your blatant and definitely not irrational hatred of cubes. Stay calm and accurate under pressure and try to earn the highest score.

Remember be rootin, be tootin and by god be shootin but most of all. Be kind.
